member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.ElasticClient.ClientConfiguration.ElasticSearchHost
member.summary: Host for ElasticSearch server (just the host, not a URL / URI)

member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.ElasticClient.ClientConfiguration.HttpScheme
member.summary: Http scheme for calling ElasticSearch, should be "http" or "https"

member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.ElasticClient.ClientConfiguration.VerifySsl
member.summary: Set to true to verify SSL certificates, false to disable (not recommended)

member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.ElasticClient.ClientConfiguration.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Timeout in seconds before request fails

member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.ElasticClient.ClientConfiguration.DefaultScrollSize
member.summary: Default number of documents to return in a single scrollable query. Defaults to 1000 if not between 10 and 5000

member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.ElasticClient.ClientConfiguration.DefaultIndex
member.summary: Default index used to initialize elasticsearch

member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.ElasticClient.ClientConfiguration.DefaultScrollTimeout
member.summary: Timeout in minutes the scroll stays alive

member.summary: Creates a NestClient from DI configuration
